mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_stocktaking_case_actual_device where case_id = #{caseId} and operation_user_id is null and operation_time is null
select tr.role_name from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tur.user_id = #{userId}
select count(1) from tb_stocktaking_case where assignee_user_id = #{assigneeUserId} and case_state = 10

select dv.device_id
from tb_device dv where dv.dept_id = #{deptId}
select case_id from tb_stocktaking_case where case_state = #{caseState}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_stocktaking_case ( case_subject, case_remark, case_state, plan_begin_time, assignee_user_id, actual_time, hospital_id, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier, plan_end_time ) values ( #{caseSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{planBeginTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{assigneeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, null, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{planEndTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
insert into tb_stocktaking_case_actual_device ( case_id, device_id, operation_user_id, operation_time ) values ( #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, null, null )
mapper.update:
update tb_stocktaking_case set case_state = 50
where case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_stocktaking_case
audit_state = #{auditState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_time = to_timestamp(#{modifyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
audit_user_id = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
